div.p: This is a base resource that represents a biological substance such as:

ul.li: hematopoietic stem cells (bone marrow, peripheral blood, or cord blood extraction)
tissues (porcine valves, skin, bovine cardiac tissue, etc.)

div.p: A NutritionalProduct, such as breast milk, fruits, vegetables, etc., distinguishes from a BiologicallyDerivedProduct, although a NutritionalProduct is mostly biological and could be processed for further use, its primary purpose is nutrition, not therapeutic, and consumed by mouth or tube feeding, not intravenously. Note that parenteral nutrition, e.g., TPN or Lipids, is not considered a NutritionalProduct, rather a medication.
This resource relates to these other resources:

ul.li: Procedure (one for collection and one for transplantation, will need to add BiologicallyDerivedProduct to the "usedReference")
